# flow open

Returns the opening flow for a stock. (volume > open interest on the order) /flow open

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/flow open [ticker]
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| ticker | Stock Ticker - Not required for subcmd: unu | True | None |


---

## Examples

```
/flow open AMD
```
---
